title: Enchanting Floral Jhumkas with South Sea Pearl Drop
materials: handset with Cubic Zirconia in a floral design; embellished with Oval-cut pink Tourmaline stones and a lustrous South Sea Pearl drop.
features: These Jhumkas showcase a delicate floral motif. The cascading design features meticulously set Cubic Zirconia, creating a brilliant sparkle. The earrings are enhanced with pink Tourmaline stones for a touch of color, and finished with a classic South Sea pearl drop for an elegant touch. The open setting allows light to flood the stones, maximizing their brilliance.
colors: Predominantly white (Cubic Zirconia) and gold plating
complemented by the soft pink of the Tourmaline and the creamy hue of the South Sea Pearl.
occasions: Perfect for adding a touch of elegance to any outfit
these Jhumkas are suitable for modern celebrations
and special occasions. Also a charming choice for celebratory events.
description: These exquisitely crafted Jhumkas blend classic South Indian sensibilities with modern design. The meticulous craftsmanship, sparkling Cubic Zirconia, vibrant Tourmaline stones, and the lustrous South Sea Pearl make this a standout piece. Lightweight and comfortable to wear, these earrings offer exceptional value and enduring style.
